paragraph: To call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Nationally Recognized Law Firm
detailsData.content: More than $1 billion recovered for our clients. Record-setting verdicts and settlements in five states for medical malpractice and motor vehicle accidents.

detailsData.title: Experienced Trial Lawyers
detailsData.content: Put our highly recognized and award-winning attorneys on your side. We will make the difference in your case.

detailsData.title: Record-Setting Results
detailsData.content: Multiple record-setting results in various practice areas. James Bostwick named Trial Lawyer of the Year.

address: 38 Keyes Avenue, Suite 115, San Francisco, CA 94129
subHeading: One of California's Leading Injury & Malpractice Law Firms
valueProp: Bostwick & Peterson is a nationally recognized law firm with a long history of winning record-setting cases for clients. Our experienced team is dedicated to providing exceptional legal representation.
